Returns the hash code of the associated {{lc|std::type_info}} object. Equivalent to calling {{l2tt|cpp/types/type_info/hash_code}} directly.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The hash code of the associated {{lc|std::type_info}} object.
